name: All Voices International
tag_list: audio-productions, foreign-languages, voice-talent, translation, subtitles, localization
overview:
All Voices International is your foreign language script translation, voice talent & production resource for all aspects of corporate, commercial, educational and government audio-standalone and audio for video applications and presentations in 40 languages.

MULTILANGUAGE AUDIO SOLUTIONS

Voice casting & scheduling
Multilanguage voice direction
ISDN and IP* talent recording, editing
& post-production
Audio lay back and subtitles to reference video or  multimedia source
Video standards conversion of programs
for foreign distribution

MULTILANGUAGE TEXT SOLUTIONS

Transcription
Translation
Voiceover adaptation
Subtitling
Text consultancy, editing & proofreading
